title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 52-11.6 - Disposition of nontransplant anatomic parts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 52-11.6 - Disposition of nontransplant anatomic parts

State Regulations
(a) All users of nontransplant anatomic parts, including whole body users, shall dispose of whole body remains, body segments, organs and tissue in accordance with existing state standards for such disposition. Users may return whole bodies or body segments to the whole body acquisition service from which the material was originally obtained. (b) Disposition of whole bodies and body segments shall be consistent with instructions provided in the consent document. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
52-11.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
